name: Extreme Kawaii Koalaball
description:
Rev your engines and kick up some sand, just don't let those cute koalas hit the ground on your side! Look out for the mystery boxes - You just might end up with more koalas than you can handle! First to 20 points wins!

Controls:
Player 1 (Red) : A and D
Player 2 (Blue): Left and Right

Built in 24 hours by...
Tori Collins (Art/Design)
Thinh Dang (Music/Design)
Brandon Dover (Sound/Design)
Micha Faw (Code/Design)
